channel.title: Pokemon Creator like game
channel.description:
[size=24pt][center][b]Engine: PHP MMORPG[/b][/center] [size=18pt][center][b]Link: [url=http://sourceforge.net/projects/php-mmorpg/?source=recommended]http://sourceforge.net/projects/php-mmorpg/?source=recommended[/url] [/b][/center]
My idea was to create a web based mmorpg now i was thinking of maybe like a Pokemon mystery Dungeon or should i use a different idea
[IMG]http://i40.tinypic.com/zwkjl.png[/img]
Is this a good idea? Should i choose Pokemon? or any other ideas i could use?

item.title: Pokemon Creator like game
item.dc:creator: @Ruby_Forums_Coder Ruby
item.description:
@Ruby_Forums_Coder wrote:

[quote=“Pwnd, post:11, topic:536416”][quote author=Ruby link=topic=655229.msg4387301#msg4387301 date=1386113243]
This is a joke. I had my post removed for saying I don’t trust his work yet he’s ripped off other people once again? This is ridiculous. Do your own fudgeing work.
[/quote]Is using an API the same as ripping off?[/quote]Before he updated the OP saying it wasn’t his work it was.

Read full topic

item.title: Pokemon Creator like game
item.dc:creator: @justaguy justaguy
item.description:
@justaguy wrote:

pkerjosh13:

I did not say i owned this… this is a open source project… i said i was working on an idea of pokemon crater , Sprites and what not. So what i want to use a base project and build up from it. and Ruby i did not see your post if it got deleted maybe you can inbox me it

Next time you should explicitly state it is not your engine so it doesn’t look like you are taking it entirely for your own credit.

Read full topic
